messages.title: THE CHOICE IN ASHTON-UNDER-LYNE
messages.content: It’s nonsense for the local Labour Party to suggest a vote for Angela Rayner in Ashton-under-Lyne doesn’t matter. The simple fact is that Jeremy Corbyn will claim each and every vote for Angela Rayner in Ashton-under-Lyne is a vote for him and his nonsensical ideas.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Theresa May’s plan for a Stronger Britain
keyPolicies.policyDescription: New trade deals for our goods and services. Secure well-paid jobs. The chance to own a home. A good school place for every child. A strong economy to pay for a strong NHS. Effective action against extremism. A more secure and united Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: With a strong hand in Brexit, we can guarantee our economic security.
issues.economy: A strong economy to pay for a strong NHS.
issues.education: A good school place for every child.
issues.health: A strong economy to pay for a strong NHS.

housing.content: The chance to own a home.

quotes.text: With your help – and your vote for my local candidate, Jack Rankin – together we can get Brexit right and secure our economic future.

images.caption: Jack Rankin with Prime Minister Theresa May.
